body.introduction: Applicants are invited for postdoctoral positions at the National University of Singapore (NUS) in the area of fuzz testing.

program_details.description: A large research program involving several research projects that improve the reliability of modern software applications using techniques inspired from fuzz testing.
program_details.research_focus: Advance the state-of-the-art in testing and analysis of concurrent/distributed/stateful software.
program_details.applications: Including kernel software such as parts of the Linux Kernel.

related_work.description: Fuzzing works will go hand in hand with our works on agentic AI based automated program repair.

requirements.education: PhD degree or should be submitting PhD thesis soon
